name: YTTracker
author: Thomas Couchoud <zerderr@gmail.com> (https://github.com/MrCraftCod/)
description: This extension will track your time on YouTube

scripts.manifest: cd chrome && cp manifestProd.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.manifestTest: cd chrome && cp manifestTest.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.zip: cd chrome && zip -r extension.zip ./* && cd ../ && mv chrome/extension.zip extension.zip
scripts.release: npm run manifest && npm run zip && npm run send && npm run clearComp && npm run releaseTest
scripts.releaseTest: npm run manifestTest && npm run zip && npm run sendTest
